analysis.description:
GatewayVote.confirmation uses tx.origin for authorization:
	- vote.voters[uint256(tx.origin)] == 0 (/unique_contracts/0xd9c422d2205248e7ec4d4c21a6b270baa66784c0.sol#170-177)

GatewayVote.stop uses tx.origin for authorization:
	- require(bool)(isVoter(tx.origin) && ! mStopped) (/unique_contracts/0xd9c422d2205248e7ec4d4c21a6b270baa66784c0.sol#191-193)

GatewayVote.start uses tx.origin for authorization:
	- require(bool)(isVoter(tx.origin) && mStopped) (/unique_contracts/0xd9c422d2205248e7ec4d4c21a6b270baa66784c0.sol#209-212)

GatewayVote.revoke uses tx.origin for authorization:
	- require(bool)(isVoter(tx.origin) && ! mStopped) (/unique_contracts/0xd9c422d2205248e7ec4d4c21a6b270baa66784c0.sol#220-221)
	- require(bool)(! vote.done && (vote.voters[uint256(tx.origin)] == 1)) (/unique_contracts/0xd9c422d2205248e7ec4d4c21a6b270baa66784c0.sol#229)

GatewayVote.changeVoter uses tx.origin for authorization:
	- require(bool)(isVoter(tx.origin) && ! mStopped && isVoter(older) && ! isVoter(newer)) (/unique_contracts/0xd9c422d2205248e7ec4d4c21a6b270baa66784c0.sol#237-239)

GatewayVote.addVoter uses tx.origin for authorization:
	- require(bool)(isVoter(tx.origin) && ! mStopped && ! isVoter(newer)) (/unique_contracts/0xd9c422d2205248e7ec4d4c21a6b270baa66784c0.sol#252-255)

GatewayVote.removeVoter uses tx.origin for authorization:
	- require(bool)(isVoter(tx.origin) && ! mStopped && isVoter(older)) (/unique_contracts/0xd9c422d2205248e7ec4d4c21a6b270baa66784c0.sol#265-268)

GatewayVote.addChain uses tx.origin for authorization:
	- require(bool)(isVoter(tx.origin) && ! mStopped && ! isChain(chain)) (/unique_contracts/0xd9c422d2205248e7ec4d4c21a6b270baa66784c0.sol#278)

GatewayVote.addApp uses tx.origin for authorization:
	- require(bool)(isVoter(tx.origin) && ! mStopped && ! isApper(app) && isChainCode(chain)) (/unique_contracts/0xd9c422d2205248e7ec4d4c21a6b270baa66784c0.sol#289-291)

GatewayVote.removeApp uses tx.origin for authorization:
	- require(bool)(isVoter(tx.origin) && ! mStopped && isAppCode(code)) (/unique_contracts/0xd9c422d2205248e7ec4d4c21a6b270baa66784c0.sol#305)

GatewayVote.mintByGateway uses tx.origin for authorization:
	- require(bool)(isVoter(tx.origin) && ! mStopped && isAppCode(appCode)) (/unique_contracts/0xd9c422d2205248e7ec4d4c21a6b270baa66784c0.sol#313-317)

GatewayVote.changeGatewayAddr uses tx.origin for authorization:
	- require(bool)(isVoter(tx.origin) && ! mStopped && isAppCode(appCode)) (/unique_contracts/0xd9c422d2205248e7ec4d4c21a6b270baa66784c0.sol#325-329)
GatewayVote.getAppAddress (/unique_contracts/0xd9c422d2205248e7ec4d4c21a6b270baa66784c0.sol#94-99) should be declared external
GatewayVote.getAppChainCode (/unique_contracts/0xd9c422d2205248e7ec4d4c21a6b270baa66784c0.sol#99-104) should be declared external
GatewayVote.getAppTokenCode (/unique_contracts/0xd9c422d2205248e7ec4d4c21a6b270baa66784c0.sol#104-109) should be declared external
GatewayVote.getAppInfo (/unique_contracts/0xd9c422d2205248e7ec4d4c21a6b270baa66784c0.sol#109-114) should be declared external
GatewayVote.getAppCode (/unique_contracts/0xd9c422d2205248e7ec4d4c21a6b270baa66784c0.sol#115-119) should be declared external
GatewayVote.isCaller (/unique_contracts/0xd9c422d2205248e7ec4d4c21a6b270baa66784c0.sol#120-125) should be declared external
GatewayVote.getChainName (/unique_contracts/0xd9c422d2205248e7ec4d4c21a6b270baa66784c0.sol#137-142) should be declared external
GatewayVote.getChainCode (/unique_contracts/0xd9c422d2205248e7ec4d4c21a6b270baa66784c0.sol#142-144) should be declared external
GatewayVote.hasConfirmed (/unique_contracts/0xd9c422d2205248e7ec4d4c21a6b270baa66784c0.sol#144-160) should be declared external
